attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The G8 Countries should abide by thier commitments as made on Behalf of thier respected Citizens and our friends in Poverty Striken Countries, due not to thier faults they need assistance to fight Poverty and HIV/AIDs, through Poverty, No Money , No Food,Lack of Medical Resoruces,they have not much alternative but to fight for thier lives and go into Terrorist Groups. The G8 countries including the Uk Government have back tracked on thier commitments, and as the G8 summit in Germany this year 2007, including the USA Government misled by stating they would give more to help, but in realisation terms, just put foreward which was agreed at the Gleneagles Summit Agreement.
sign up to this petition and inform the Governments it is unacceptable to mislead on our behalf, the citizens who vote them in, the Embarrashment our Citizens get, who care, when our Government mislead on our behalf.
Dennis Hambridge

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
